articles.title: Amarnath cloud burst death toll rises to 16, rescue operations on: Key developments
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: The death toll in the flash flood triggered by a cloudburst near the Amarnath cave shrine rose to 16 on Saturday while 15,000 stranded pilg.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Centre open to public-private partnership to strengthen space industry: ISRO chief Somanath
articles.description: With regard to investment, ISRO chief S Somanath said it would be 100 per cent for Indian companies and 70 per cent through FDI with the approval of the Centre.
